Dialogs.Text: Thomas B: It's time to calm down for a bit. Yes, this is not a good situation, but this isn't the first time a freak tries to use my information against me.
Thomas B: Freaking out is not going to solve anything.
Thomas B: Ok, so, if i recap what happened today, i can fully assess the situation i'm in right now.
Thomas B: Who knows, a solution might came out of it, or at least a plan of what to do tomorrow...
Thomas B: Let's start form the beggining, someone anonymous claiming to be a fan send me a message.
Thomas B: In it, they say to have found an abandoned, but still functioning, private server of 'Roomates.com'. And along with it, a private link to enter.
Thomas B: They also said i should found them in some part of the chat to discuss a request he wanted to gave me.
Thomas B: Entering the link, indeed it gave me access to the long shut down 'Roomates.com', just as the message said.
Thomas B: But upon further inspection of the chat, i stumble upon something that i wasn't made aware on the message.
Thomas B: What was this exactly?
